unnormalised: Wow, Ayurveda treatments sound amazing! I've heard great things about Kerala Ayurveda centers. My aunt, Priya aunty, went to one near Kochi for her back pain. She said it was life-changing after just 2 weeks! Maybe I'll try it during Onam holidays next year. Gotta try that biryani there too, heard it's the best. Rs. 50,000 well spent, she claims! Definitely worth looking into for overall wellness, hai na?
normalised: Wow, Ayurveda treatments sound amazing! I've heard great things about Kerala Ayurveda centers. My aunt, Priya aunty, went to one near Kochi for her back pain. She said it was life-changing after just two weeks! Maybe I'll try it during Onam holidays next year. Gotta try that biryani there too, heard it's the best. Rupee fifty thousand well spent, she claims! Definitely worth looking into for overall wellness, hai na?
